column4: Hoping someone is around to assist me with some things ubuntu 12.04
Is there a way to completely disable grub?
even if I am not dual booting?

I have mac system and have ubuntu installed into the windows partition by itself, but when I select the ubuntu partition, it loads the grub then i have to select the menu item. I want to click my os then have no grub delay and it just boot
is there a different grub I can install that will work faster?
